questions.question: What is money primarily used for?
What does #inflation# refer to?
options: A decrease in the value of money
An increase in the value of money
A decrease in the general level of prices
An increase in the general level of prices
questions.correct_answer: An increase in the general level of prices

questions.question: Which of the following is a *SMART* goal?
What is a budget?
options: A plan for spending and saving money
questions.correct_answer: A plan for spending and saving money

questions.question: How much should you aim to save in an emergency fund?
Why is it important to set financial goals?
questions.answer: Setting financial goals helps you plan and prioritize your spending and saving, ensuring you can achieve both short-term and long-term financial objectives.

questions.question: Describe a good financial habit and explain why it is beneficial.
questions.answer: A good financial habit could be tracking your spending. This is beneficial because it helps you understand where your money is going and identify areas where you can cut back and save more.
